barlin nuwara sambodhi wiharadhipathi shastharapathi pujya garu rambaukwalle dewananda himipananwahansege anusashasana saha adhikshanaya yatathe saha barlin wiharawasi shastharapathi pujya garu kongaspitiye shantharakkhitha himipananwahansege sambandhikaranaya matha sidukerunu mema pinkamata lankawe sita gampaha nayiwala purwaramadhipathi ha bemmulla bauddha sanskruthika madhyasthanadhipathi aluthkuru koralaye pradhana upa sanghanayaka shastharawedi panditha pujya garu rathmale somarathana nayaka swamin wahanse, osteliyawe nyanaponika bauddha madhyasthanadhipathi aacharya pujya garu wijayapura silawansha nahimi, switsarlanthaye surich, jiniwa ha bon bauddha wiharasthanawala anushasaka jarmaniye pa්radhana sangha nayaka aacharya pujya garu walpola kalyanathissa nahimi athulu fa්rarankfat buddha wiharaye shastharapathi rathmale punynyarathana himi, miyunich nuwara wilawchiye dhammawijaya himi, kannnimahara piyasirihimi, switsarlanthaye sentgalan nagaraye lankaramadhipathi lendiyangala sudassihimi, jiniwa bauddha wiharadhipathi halyale wimalarathana himi, hambarg bauddha wiharawasi thalpawila kusalanyana himi, saha delgoda kalyanapradipa piriwen widyathanaye niyojya pariwenadhipathi sigiriye rathanapala himi yana himiwaru mema punya karmaya sandaha wadama kalaha.

nidahasa laba wasara hataka kalaya thula kala siyalla ek kalath pasugiya wasara ata thula rata godanagimata kala dewalata sama kala nohaki bawath jathiya godanagana aththiwaramak bandu sanwardhanaya sidu kale heta upadina daruwan wenuwen bawath janadhipathiwaraya prakasha kaleya.ada shri lankawa aasiyawe wegayenma nagi sitina ratak yayi thanapathiwarun prakasha karana wita thamata mahath aadambarayak danena bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya gewunu hama payakma gatha kale sanwardhanaya wenuwen bawath kiweya.rata wata kara wata banndath kata wata kara wata bandinnata nohaki yayi kiwak men athamun mewani wyapruthi desa eershyawen balana bawa sihipath kala janadhipathiwaraya me wyapruthiwalata waya wana mudala pilibanda katha karanne eda pan piti kannata pitaratawalata naya wu pirisama bawa prakasha kaleya.waraya kshethraye danata labana rupiyal koti 4000ka aadayama 2020 wana wita rupiyal koti 10000 dakwa ihala damima aramuna bawath waraya ha nawuka kendraya godanaga waraya pahak ekawara sadima sha්ri lankeya chathiye anagathaya pilibanda sitha karana dawantha aayochanayak bawath wadiduratath pawasiya.waraya sanwardhana wyapruthi amathi rohitha abegunawardhana, shri lanka waraya adhikariye sabhapathi aacharya priyath bandu wikrama, aasiyanu sanwardhana bankuwe upa sabhapathi, hundayi samagame sabhapathi saha pradhana widhayaka him jang mahathwaru da mehidi adahas dak wu athara nimal siripala da silwa, nirmala kothalawala amathiwaruda, wides rajya thanthrikayoda, aarakshaka mandalika pradhani pramukha thriwidha hamudapathiwaru saha polispathiwaraya da athulu pirisak da me awasthawata ek wuha.seda mawathe ran dora wiwara wu wagayi...
